This game is truly one of my favorites. There are a lot of perks about this game lemme start off with the plus sides. This game is really easy to run so you don't have to have a really good pc. Also this game isn't that hard to learn you just have to take some time into it. It is also very cheap all the time, it is mostly on sale but if it isn't it is a cheap price of 20 dollars so thats good. Now let me say the cons. This game is somewhat pay to win because most of the dlc have very overpowered perks(i am mostly talking about killer) for example spirit has really good perks and hag has some of the best killer perks in the entire game. But the free killers still do have somewhat good perks. Also at some points in time the community can get very toxic which is annoying and sometimes you can get teammates that are actual potatoes ;) . Also this is a game where you have to take a pretty good amount of your time to get good at because there are a lot of things to learn like meta perks , how to loop , how to mindgame as killer , and how to stay hidden/away from the killer. a lot of content creators I recommend for this game if you are going to learn from people are Otsdarva(for killer and survivor) Monto (for killer) and Noob3(for survivor). The graphics aren't the best but its not that hard to deal with.

Un jeu avec un gros potentiel, mais selon moi gâché par le côté commercial que l'on découvre facilement après quelques dizaines d'heures passées dessus.

L'idée de départ est géniale, mais plus on y joue, plus le jeu devient répétitif et lassant. Avoir des connaissances avec qui jouer fait que l'on peut toujours y prendre du plaisir, mais moins qu'au départ, lorsqu'on découvre le gameplay du jeu & qu'on fait face aux 1ères frayeurs en se faisant observer par Ghostface ou poignarder par Michael Myers.

Les nouvelles compétences & nouveaux personnages / tueurs réguliers ne masquent pas l'absence d'intérêt des nombreux DLCs - très chers & franchement ridicules en terme de contenu - et des nouvelles maps, quasi-identiques & sans grandes nouveautés...

De mon avis, les développeurs s'en mettent facilement plein les poches en en faisant le moins possible. Car des idées pour améliorer le jeu, il y en a à la pelle : instaurer le micro en jeu - augmenter le nombre de joueurs (comme dans Friday the 13th), augmenter le nombre de tueurs... 

Parce que faire payer des DLCs au prix d'un nouveau jeu (12e le dernier en date) ça va un moment, si encore il y avait quelque chose dedans !

they removed my cosmetics, bad game :(

It's a scary game of course. That no doubt, despite all the horror shown , it is one of the best game on steam for a murder-survival type of game. Hands down. You should really give it a try. Wont regret it. Have Fun!
Don't play this with people who get angry easily. As long as you follow that rule you'll be fine.
it's impossible to win against most of the killers and that's because they buffed some killers and some players camping
honestly one of the only games I've continuously played over the year I've had my pc. got it on sale, worth it for sure
O jogo é muito bom, mas bem bugado. Tu ta jogando de boas e do nada cai da partida e tu ainda ganha punição como se tivesse desconectado por querer.

So this is my 4th altered review for this game and 2nd time I've changed it from 'not recommended' to 'recommended.' 

This game is awesome in short bursts. However, the grind for it is insane and the replay-ability feels very short once you realize there is a clear distinct meta in the game that is very boring to both play and play against. Yet everybody does. Same perks, same characters, same play styles, and same maps.

To the new players looking for a simplistic survival horror game; this is an excellent game for you.

To the hardcore strategists and grinders; you may want to find another game. Because this one will consume you and spit you back out a shell of your former self.
una pija pero voy a seguir jugando
Im going to say it straight BEST game for a group of friends really funny scary and over all very fun, can frustrate at time but it is mostly fun
devs still dont listen to the community, mostly cuz the community is extremely toxic. Avoid this game.

I've only played this game for 5 hours, but I'm already tired of people not sitting still to be healed.  Don't forget people attempting to get free multiple times and not choosing to struggle, dying in the course of at most 15 seconds.  I can only assume my pain will grow, as long as my player level is too low.

Will keep everyone posted! -3/26/20
Good adrenaline rush!  You will scream.  Fun team work game (survivors) or good stress reducer (killer) Playing with friends is more fun than alone.

Jogo que tem tudo para ser bom, mas conta com devs iludidos que não veem problemas simples de se resolver, problemas tão simples que eles só não resolvem porque consideram os problemas "features". Não vou nem entrar na infinidade de bugs que vem em cada patch, que eles tbm não ligam, jogo mais bugado que eu já joguei nos meus 20 anos jogando o game devia se chama Colméia By Daylight de tanto bug que tem dentro. O balanceamento de perks e personagens é vergonhoso e me faz achar que é feito por uma criança de 7 anos com paralisia cerebral.
除了有的时候莫名其妙崩溃，其实还是挺好的
It took me 10 hours to realise how toxic this community is <3

Un pedazo de videojuego el cual se disfruta cada partida la cual juegas, no te sientas decepcionado si es que te pasa matando el asesino o incluso si tu no matas a los survivors tan solo hay que echarle muchas horas jugando viendo las diferentes builds y subiendo tus pj para sacar sus ventajas para todos los otros y por supuesto si ya tienes varias horas jugadas recomiendo comprarte algunos dlcs los cuales valen la pena. 10/10

(I have over 500 hours on this game on PS4, and recently bought the PC version) While the game may have a bug or two, at times there are tons of them but they get fixed quickly, the game is incredibly fun. There are some games where you will feel enraged because you get camped by a killer, you get tunneled, or your teammates don't help you, but you can't blame the game for that. Killers are punished for camping, and survivors are punished for leaving their teammates. I've had some of the most fun gaming experiences playing with friends, and I still love playing the game alone. If you are still unsure just buy it when it is on sale, you won't regret it if you give it a chance.

Recomendo o jogo pra quem tiver paciência para crashes, pois este jogo "crasha" toda hora, todo dia, toda semana.
Tirando o fato de dar muitos problemas, é um jogo muito divertido.
Se os desenvolvedores conseguirem eliminar esses problemas o jogo será muito melhor.
Excelente juego, muy interesante y con una gran dinámica
В целом игра интересная. Но готовьтесь к боли, будучи маном новичком готовьтесь играть в лобби с сурвами 1-10 рангов.
Играйте на свой страх и риск. Есть два варианта происходящего вас ебут или все также ебут вас. В это играть в здравом уме невозможно

Its a good game playing survivor and killer, pretty easy to learn but can be difficult to learn the in depth knowledge but if you put the time and the effort into it, you will get there like i did and many others.

Nice game for adrenaline kicks and hilarious situations when playing with a premade group (as survivors).
Playing solo as survivor means you'll be matched with 3 other survivors, who are most of the time helpfull and teamplayers. There are always some rotten apples though :P
Playing solo as the killer is fun too and you can do what you like. Can be harder to play; you don't have team mates as killer ;)
This game can be perfectly played in between stuff or when you don't have a lot of time, 'cause the matches aren't (usually) long, which is a good thing in my opinion. And not 1 game is the same :)
Fun game. Entirely based on skill/number of hours.
good with friends, kinda sucks by yourself

This game is fun with friends... but has gone so far down hill. When i first began playing it, it was so much fun! I had fun everyday... but all the dlc has ruined the game. It'd be fine but honestly you can't play have the killers and the dlc killers are all balanced badly. It's a pay to win game now, and I have lost EVERY survivor game and won EVERY killer game. It's sad how badly its gone downhill. It's not balanced at all and no one ever wants to play survivor because of it. Maybe i'd recommend it again if they get their crap together.
